oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Adam Wright - 2018-05-19
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Adam Wright from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 19, 2018. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Adam Wright;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in Music / (03:32) Opening comments and songwriter introduction by Abi Tapia / (06:46) Opening comments from Adam / (07:20) Introduces the first song / (07:56) Performs Thunder And Lightning / (11:02) Talks about the previous song / (11:22) Introduces the next song / (11:57) Performs End Of The End Of The World / (14:23) Talks about the previous song / (14:53) Introduces the next song / (15:11) Performs From My Bough / (18:!0) Talks about the previous song / (18:30) Introduces the next song / (20:06) Performs The Older I Get / (23:40) Answers question about the kind of guitar that he plays / (24:52) Answers question about writing music or words first / (26:30) Answers question about his favorite songwriter / (28:50) Introduces the next song / (31:21) Performs Mayhayley’s House / (35:31) Answers question about his first guitar / (37:30) Answers question about regretting writing or recording songs / (38:32) Introduces the next song / (39:00) Performs All The Trouble / (43:26) Answers question about how well he can gauge how his songs will be received / (45:44) Answers question about a songwriter gets songs to artists / (46:53) Answers question about the first song that he wrote / (47:11) Introduces the next song / (47:25) Performs Born To Dream / (51:15) Final comments / (51:30) Walk-out Music / (53:11) FILE END
